data.title: Corel Pinnacle Studio 26 Ultimate
data.meta_description: Corel Pinnacle Studio 26 Ultimate - Anyone can now come forward as a movie producer with Corel Pinnacle Studio 26 Ultimate flexible video editing software!
data.text:
Corel Pinnacle Studio 26 Ultimate- Create with inspiration. Edit with Pinnacle.

Edit like a pro with the power, precision and control of Pinnacle Studio ™ 26 Ultimate. This advanced video editing suite is packed with professional-quality tools and powerful keyframe controls, so you can get incredible results. Transform your footage with enhanced video masks and enhance colors with a complete suite of color enhancement features. Edit smoothly and seamlessly on an unlimited number of tracks and create custom tool shortcuts to streamline your most used tasks. Take advantage of enhanced keyframe features to create custom titles and movements, use hundreds of creative effects, and produce videos of all shapes and sizes with tools for multi-camera editing, screen recording, 360 video editing and more. With Pinnacle Studio Ultimate, there are no limits.

New and improved features, numerous useful tools for editing your videos to make your videos even more more vivid with Corel Pinnacle Studio 26 Ultimate! Corel has listened to all the improvements and suggestions from the people who use the program the most, you as a consumer! Corel is unique in this and tries to accommodate its users and facilitate their experience and implementation of the program. For example, new features such as simplified color enhancement and MultiCam Capture make sure you get the most out of your videos!

Studio Ultimate

Includes 2000+ effects, titles and templates. Edit HD and 4K video on an indefinite number of tracks.

Includes everything from Studio Plus, and:

Video Masks

Selective Vector Scope

Export alpha channels

NewBlue Audio Essentials

Improved 360 video editing

Improved Keyframe Control for Color Enhancement

Purchase via 2Go Software means 100% genuine software including installation warranty, step-by-step guide for download, install and activate, and a team of specialists who are happy to help if you still can't figure it out! if you still can't figure it out!

The advanced features of Corel Pinnacle Studio 26 Ultimate

Anyone can now pretend to be a film producer with Corel Pinnacle Studio 26 flexible video editing software. Explore the program to create unique projects using different templates or by editing raw footage directly. Now you can take advantage of even more features to make your video editing easier, including: editing multi-camera footage, split-screen video and more! Corel Pinnacle Studio 26 Ultimate also comes with over 1,800 filters and effects and you can now export your videos to your disc, popular formats and devices, or simply online. Create the most beautiful videos and leave a stunning commentary for the people you want to share them with!

Corel Pinnacle Studio 26 Ultimate's powerful features explained in detail

The best tools to improve your videos even more

Base colour enhancement: Select any colour and change or correct it individually. This way, you can set the mood of your entire video.

Follow movements: Just like a sports competition, you can now edit your videos to highlight a particular moving part. Focus your attention on a particular guest and apply the desired overlay yourself.

Lens Correction, Transparency and Audio Ducking:Easily remove distortion and straighten curved lines with lens correction, add more impact with transparency functions and refine dialogue or comments with background noise. Create the best, sharpest videos in no time.

Make all your creative ideas a reality

MultiCam Capture: With the new MultiCam Capture software, you can now record not only your screen, but also your webcam at the same time. Capture video, system audio and sound effortlessly and edit it with one click using the many functions offered by MultiCam Capture.

Easily change and correct the colours in your production for spectacular colour reproduction. Shift colours and adjust saturation. Then save your changes and use them on the next film you edit.

Selective colour: Add a stunning effect to your image by highlighting a specific colour and leaving the rest black and white for an even more professional impression.

Edit videos for shared screens and recordings from different cameras: Display multiple video streams simultaneously and easily create impressive promo videos or share the best moments of your latest holiday. Choose from several templates or create your own using the template creation function. In addition, you can now combine recordings from different devices for the most dynamic videos. So you can create your own multi-camera production.

Chromakey, play with the clock and easily edit the audio of your videos: Easily place your designs on a virtual background with the Green Screen function. Customise overlays and replace the background with the Chromakey. Play with time, go back in time or freeze it with the Time Reassign feature to set your own speed. Plus, there are countless ways to edit or add audio to your video with the ScoreFitter music library.

Edit your videos flexibly with advanced software

Edit your timeline: Stay in control and make all your productions as professional as possible. Easily edit and trim your videos on the timeline. Timeline editing lets you edit multiple tracks and place multiple effects indefinitely for precise frame and keyframe editing.

Create great slideshows with your photos and videos and add different filters and effects: With the SmartMovie feature, you can now easily drag and drop your photos, videos and music. SmartMovie helps you create an automatic movie production and for even more impression, apply one of our many video filters or effects. Choose from hundreds of effects and enhance your colours, for example, to give your videos an even better impression.

Customise your work and maintain full control

Zoom in and out, add quick corrections, titles and overlays and create your own templates:Easily and quickly add motion to a still image and layer a clip to get the desired effect frame by frame. Avoid common problems and apply quick fixes to your video. For example, you can crop and rotate or even remove red eyes. Now for the extra bit of effect, add a title to your photos or video and save your projects as templates to get other projects started faster.

Now easily share all your creations with your family, colleagues or friends

Upload directly to your social media account and export to popular formats and devices: Easily upload your video to YouTube or Facebook, for example, and also export to popular formats for proper viewing on any device.

Now burn your projects onto a disc: Now create your DVDs like a professional filmmaker with customisable chapter menus and music.

A powerful video editor with fully customisable controls

Keyframes, custom profiles and dual screen display: Use keyframes to control each effect from start to finish and apply different video effects as you see fit. Plus, customise your workspace and create your own shortcuts to make things easy on yourself. Use the two-screen display option and view multiple aspects simultaneously to edit your videos seamlessly on multiple screens.

Organise your media and benefit from robust performance: Easily share your media and add your most used effect to your favourites with one click. Benefit from faster playback on multiple tracks and display your results clearly and quickly.

Studio Ultimate

Includes 2000+ effects, titles and templates. HD and 4K video editing on an unlimited number of tracks.

Contains everything from Studio Plus, and:

Video masks

Selective vector-scope

Exporting Alpha channels

NewBlue Audio Essentials

Improved 360° video editing

Improved keyframe control for colour enhancement
